inclusion.criterion: patients selected for treatment with the inhaled combination of propionic Fluticasone and Salmeterol (500+50)mcg - Rolenium- administered with Elpenhaler device
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: a history of repeated exacerbations who have significant symptoms despite regular bronchodilator therapy treated in Hospital outpatient specialist ward settings, in the daily clinical practice
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients not selected for treatment with the inhaled combination of propionic Fluticasone and Salmeterol (500+50)mcg - Rolenium- administered with Elpenhaler device
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of asthma and frequent cough, wheezing, and shortness of breath. He is currently using inhaled corticosteroid (ICS) and fluticasone 500 mcg/salmeterol 50 mcg, one puff twice daily.
